supplements.description: High-quality vitamins and health boosters. Browse our selection and add to your cart.
supplements.disclaimer: Supplements are retail products and do not require a prescription. For prescription medicines, please visit the Medicines section.

vit-c-1.description: A powerful antioxidant formula to support immune defence, skin health, and energy metabolism. Buffered for gentle absorption — suitable for daily use without stomach discomfort.

vit-d-1.description: Essential for strong bones, a healthy immune system, and mood regulation. Each softgel provides the most bioavailable form of Vitamin D, dissolved in a carrier oil for optimal absorption.

mult-1.description: A comprehensive once-daily formula packed with 23 essential vitamins and minerals. Covers nutritional gaps and supports energy, focus, and overall vitality — perfect for busy lifestyles.

prot-1.description: High-quality whey protein isolate with 27g of protein per serving and minimal fat and lactose. Ideal for post-workout recovery, muscle building, and high-protein diets. Mixes easily with water or milk.

bcaa-1.description: Branched-Chain Amino Acids in a proven 2:1:1 ratio of Leucine, Isoleucine, and Valine. Reduces muscle soreness, speeds up recovery, and supports endurance during intense training sessions.

about.subtitle: About Amilax Pharmaceuticals
about.title: A Pharmacy Built on
about.description: Serving our community with genuine medicines, ethical practices, and care that puts your health first.
about.storyP1: Amilax Pharmaceuticals was founded with a simple belief: every family deserves access to genuine, affordable medicines from a pharmacy they can trust. Over the past 3 years, we have worked to earn that trust — one prescription at a time.
about.storyP2: We don't make tall promises. Instead, we focus on what matters — stocking authentic products from authorized distributors, having qualified pharmacists review every prescription, and treating each customer with honesty and respect.
about.storyP3: Whether you need everyday medicines, help understanding a prescription, or simply a pharmacy that's open when you need it, Amilax is here — every day until midnight.
values: Medicines sourced only from authorized distributors
Open every day, 9 AM to midnight
about.genuineMedicinesDesc: Every product in our pharmacy is sourced directly from authorized distributors. We do not stock unverified or grey-market medicines.
about.ethicalDispensingDesc: Our pharmacists verify prescriptions before dispensing. We never substitute medicines without informing you, and we never push unnecessary products.
about.availableDesc: We stay open every day from 9 AM to midnight because health needs don't follow a schedule.
about.commitmentDesc: We believe in being straightforward about how we operate. Here's what you can expect — and what you'll never see — at Amilax.
promiseItems: Transparent pricing with no hidden charges
dontDoItems: Dispense prescription medicines without a valid prescription
